Html:
How do I set the default background color for all cells to be white?

I'm new to this, and I tried the getDefaultStyle thing, but I'm lost...

Works:

$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getDefaultStyle()->getFont()->setName('Arial');
$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getDefaultStyle()->getFont()->setSize(10);

Doesn't Work:
$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getDefaultStyle()->getFill()->setFillType(PHPExcelStyleFill::FILL_SOLID);
$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getDefaultStyle()->getFill()->getStartColor()->setARGB('FF808080');
I'm not sure if it's even possible to do. Will check!
